title: Bloomberg Markets: Bernardi on The Inversion Factor

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Linda Bernardi\u0010Chief Executive Officer\u0010StraTerra Partners\u0010Discussing her book "The Inversion Factor" on how to thrive in the IoT economy.
